updates.title: ElevenLabs CEO predicts AI audio models will become 'commoditized' over time, while still maintaining competitive advantage in the short term through superior model quality and innovation.
Nvidia becomes the first public company to reach $5 trillion market cap, now worth more than the combined stock markets of all countries except the US, China, and Japan.
Grammarly rebrands to 'Superhuman' after acquiring the Superhuman email client in July and launches a new AI assistant to expand beyond writing assistance.
Character.AI ends chatbot experience for kids following lawsuits and public outcry after two teenager suicides, implementing significant platform changes to protect minors.
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman predicts the company will have a 'legitimate AI researcher' by 2028, betting on algorithmic innovation and scaling up 'test time compute' for model thinking processes.
